content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'gold_bigpharma_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [gold_bigpharma_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.d_products (
	[product_id] int,
	[product_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[brand_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[sub_brand_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[category_name] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'd_products/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [gold_bigpharma_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.d_products
GO
